resources.string: Ingredients: 2 cups all purpose flour 1tbsp baking powder 1/2 cup white sugar 1/4 tsp salt 1 tbsp melted margarine, butter or cooking oil 1/4 cup evaporated milk 1 pc large egg 1 tsp vanilla flavor 1/2 cup sesame seeds cooking oil for frying

Indulge in the delightful taste of Binangkal, a beloved Filipino treat that originates from Cebu. These deep-fried dough balls are made from a mixture of rice flour and coconut, giving them a unique chewy texture. Magluto nata!
